headline: How the 2020 election war on bots and trolls differs from 2016
summary: The 2016 election exposed how social media could be used by a foreign adversary to sow dissent and distrust within American borders. At the center of the fight against misinformation and polarization on social media are bots and trolls. Understanding how they operate could be the key to fighting their influence.
